short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a notification on selected websites to remind you to get back to work.
short.pt_BR: Exibe uma notificação em sites selecionados para lhe lembrar de voltar ao trabalho.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display a small notification on selected websites to remind you to get back to work. 

It's OpenSource Too! You can contribute to the extension with your ideas and code at https://github.com/rhnvrm/back2work
